HostSlick’s Winter Specials: 12c/32GB e5 for €69/mo, 3GB RAM VPS in the Netherlands for 40€ / year

hostslick, netherlands February 17, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Are you feeling the post-holiday winter blues?  Has your mood dipped with the temperatures?  If so, HostSlick has the cure: some great dedi and VPS offers!

They were on LEB several times in 2020.  Now they’ve like to brighten your winter spirits with these great deals:

  • E5-2680v3 dedi server with 12c/24t, 32GB of RAM, dual 1TB SSD, and 25TB of DDoS-protected bandwidth for 69 € per month!
  • Or get 15% off (recurring!) on other deals!
  • And if you just need a VPS, they can hook you up with a 2 core, 3GB RAM, 50GB SSD VPS with 5TB bandwidth for 40€ / year.

Note that stock is limited, so jump on this immediately!

HostSlick is based in the Netherlands and their WHOIS is public.  You can read their privacy policy and terms of service on their web site.  They accept Paysafecard, Bitcoin, Giropay, SofortBanking/SofortÜberweisung, PayPal, Credit Card, and SEPA Bank Transfer.  Their AS number is AS208046.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Here’s what they had to say: 

“Im Maximilian from HostSlick and today we are sending you a offer that might fit most types of customers! Strong CPU and fair amount of RAM baked with high Network Quality, DDoS Protection and 8x IPv4 included besides the /64 IPv4! Im sure this can fit most use cases!  If needed, customers can as weell bring their own IPv4 Ranges and we will announce them for FREE!

Why HostSlick?

  • Fastest SSDs with any Dedicated
  • Easy-to-use Control Panel which also allows our clients to re-sell Dedicated Servers.
  • Wide range of Payment methods accepted
  • Complimentary 100Gbps Corero SmartWalls DDoS Protection with any Dedicated!
  • Additional IPs on request at anytime!
  • Own Hardware, Network. We are not resellers!
  • Network based on industry leading Juniper Equipment
  • All Dedicated servers include IPMI/ILO4/… Full control over your Server!
  • Support On-Site 24×7
  • Free IP Announcements (Have a IP range? We will announce it with NO FEE on our Router and ASN!)”

Now read more to see the offers!

I'm Andrew, techno polymath and long-time LowEndTalk community Moderator. My technical interests include all things Unix, perl, python, shell scripting, and relational database systems. I enjoy writing technical articles here on LowEndBox to help people get more out of their VPSes.
